dmca.title: [ABUSE] Lacoste Alligator, S.A. - U.S. - shopandsave.com selling counterfeit Lacoste
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 18, 2005 2:28 PM
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Lacoste Alligator, S.A. - U.S. - shopandsave.com
selling counterfeit Lacoste clothing (Our Ref.: LCA USA TC-04/27113)

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Frances O'Keeffe <fokeeffe@frosszelnick.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Thursday, February 17, 2005, 6:55:19 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Lacoste Alligator, S.A. - U.S. - shopandsave.com selling
counterfeit Lacoste clothing (Our Ref.: LCA USA TC-04/27113)

===8<==============Original message text===============
Attached please find a demand letter of today's date from Lisa Pearson,
Esq. regarding the above-referenced matter.

If responding to this email, please reply to Ms. Pearson directly at
lpearson@frosszelnick.com.

Thank you.

Fran O'Keeffe
Legal Secretary - Night Staff


****************************************************************************
****************************************
The information contained in this E-mail message may be privileged,
confidential, and protected
from disclosure.  Any unauthorized use, printing, copying, disclosure or
dissemination of this
communication may be subject to legal restriction or sanction.  If you think
that you have received
this E-mail message in error, please reply to the sender.
****************************************************************************
******************************************

===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCFk/fvK/XpJs6oyURAt4wAJ0Qy3VimNvmE6+cMHmvUl/pPcqTxwCeMc2C
naD4yUknNzAvyi2EfxW9yk4=
=HPYy
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
dmca.principal_name: Fross Zelnick Lehrman & Zissu, P.C. (For Lacoste)
